citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 2:45 pm on
26-Feb-19. The inspector contacted a facility employee upon arrival. The facility employee indicated the supervisor
was out of town and unavailable to conduct an inspection.
A responsible person shall be available for inspection during business hours.

narrative:
2.126(b)
ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 2:45 pm on
26-Feb-19.  The inspector contacted a facility employee upon arrival.  The facility employee indicated the supervisor
was out of town and unavailable to conduct an inspection.
A responsible person shall be available for inspection during business hours.
